thread.title: Don’t Count Those Saudis Out Just Yet
thread.title_full: Don’t Count Those Saudis Out Just Yet - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Don’t Count Those Saudis Out Just Yet
text: Regarding Glenn Hegar’s “The Saudis Gambled and Texas Won” (op-ed, Sept. 1): Mr. Hegar has a mistaken view of Saudi policy. Saudi Arabia never thought it could “kill” the American fracking industry. Fracking cannot be killed because even when a fracking operator fails, the oil remains in the ground and the assets are ready for a stronger, more successful enterprise to purchase. The recourse and the market will still be there. Saudi Aramco, with its vast resources and history of buying North American and global assets, is at least as likely as any other multinational oil company (Exxon, Chevron, etc.) to acquire the...
